summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the drainage system of Seattle Public Utilities; authorizing acquisition by purchase or condemnation of parcels of land located at 132 30th Avenue East and 138 30th Avenue East, in the Madison Valley neighborhood of Seattle, amending the 2005-2010 Adopted Capital Improvement Program to add this property acquisition and allocate funds for it, and increasing an appropriation to Seattle Public Utilities in the 2005 budget with respect to this acquisition.
